name: Ziina
author: Ziina

sections.description: Ziina (زينة) makes it easy for UAE businesses to begin collecting payments from their customers. Sign up for the app in just minutes, and get paid on your website, in your DMs, and face to face. Shoot out payment links on WhatsApp, Instagram, or wherever you chat with your customers. Anyone can scan your QR code to pay by card at markets, bazaars, popups, or on the go. And with Ziina’s mobile app, you can run your business wherever you are.
sections.changelog:
1.2.2 – Declare High-Performance Order Storage compatibility
1.2.1 – New currencies support
1.2.0 – WooCommerce Blocks support
1.0.1 – Bug fixes
1.0.0 – Release

short_description: Ziina accepts Apple Pay, Google Pay, Visa, and Mastercard.
